title: NBA Finals, Damian Lillard & Fan Questions W/ Paul Pierce | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: NBA Finals, Damian Lillard & Fan Questions W/ Paul Pierce | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On a very special edition of WHATS BURNIN, Matt is joined by 'The Truth' Paul Pierce, to breakdown the NBA finals ahead of tonight's game 6 and discuss the latest surrounding Dame Lillard and the Blazers. Plus they answer fan questions and talks USA olympics basketball team.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
